bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

sense.def: Pathological Condition brought forth by a non-transformation of phlegm, desiccation of body liquids, and the formation of sticky phlegm nodes. Shen nong ben cao jing 神農本草經 Substance Entry chang shan 常山：主 傷寒寒熱，熱發，温瘧鬼毒，胸中痰結，吐逆 , “It controls harm caused by cold with alternating sensations of cold and heat, heat effusion, warmth malaria and demon poison, as well as phlegm nodes in the chest and vomiting with counterflow”.
